Text: Birks Group:  As of June 30, 2015, it operates stores under three different retail banners: 27 "Maison Birks" stores across Canada (formerly "Birks"), 17 "Mayors" stores in Florida and Georgia, and 2 "Brinkhaus" stores in Vancouver and Calgary.
